channel.title: [Classes] Minor Butler Rework
channel.description:
With the new update, the King has been put in a different place. Now, he can take action by himself. The only direct hardcounter to an Evil or Neut King BD has, is the Butler, but I think we all agree that he is extremely underpowered when comparing to the Drunk. Don't get me wrong, the Drunk is well balanced. But I think the Butler needs something more.
[Quote] Butler:
Passives:
Dutiful: (same)
Abilities:
Serve Wine: (same)
Concentrated Wine: (N) (2) Throw a party. Everyone who visits you will be occupied tonight. Bypasses occupy immunity, and takes priority over Drunk/Alcoholic's Happy Hour.
Nightshade Wine: (D) (1) Poison the King. Usable starting from Day 3.
Drugged Wine: (D) (3) (Experimental) Prevent a player from using Day Abilities today. Will not work on occupy immune classes. No feedback showing if player is occupy immune or not. [/quote]
Also more stuff here
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minor-changes-suggestion/40457?u=livicus
